review.purpose: Files that need your input before being organized.
review.signals: Low confidence matches or ambiguous filenames.

work.signals: Resumes, contracts, performance reviews, company docs.

money.signals: Bank statements, invoices, receipts, tax forms.

home.signals: Leases, mortgages, utilities, insurance, appliance manuals.

health.signals: Medical records, prescriptions, insurance claims, lab results.

legal.signals: Contracts, agreements, court documents, IDs, certificates.

family.signals: Photos, personal letters, family records, memories.

clients.signals: Client contracts, invoices, project files, communications.

projects.signals: Project plans, deliverables, meeting notes, resources.

travel.signals: Passports, visas, boarding passes, hotel reservations, itineraries.

archive.signals: Documents older than 4 years, historical records.
